DataElement.preferredName: Post  Clinical Trial Treatment Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text field describing therapies received by a patient after the end of a specified clinical trial that are different from the options previously described.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post  Clinical Trial Treatment Other Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
